edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.attentioncodelets
Interface AttentionCodelet

All Superinterfaces:
Activatible, java.util.concurrent.Callable<FrameworkTask>, Codelet, FrameworkTask, FullyInitializable, Initializable, Learnable, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttentionCodeletImpl, BasicAttentionCodelet
public interface AttentionCodelet
extends Codelet

A kind of Codelet that checks WorkspaceBuffers for its desired content and possibly adds Coalitions to the GlobalWorkspace

Author:
Ryan J McCall
